title: The Must Haves of a Winners Paradigm with Alundas Havens
itunes:title: The Must Haves of a Winners Paradigm with Alundas Havens
description:
Helping others to establish a dominant brand through podcasting is what Podcast Powertrain is all about. One of the many people that make that possible is Alundas Havens.  His tumultuous upbringing caused him to develop grit and a strong work ethic. Despite his tough childhood, Alundas knew from an early age that he was going to make it, even if it was just to prove everyone wrong. 

 

After 4 years in the Marine Corp., Alundas tried his hand at a few things, but really wanted to start a podcast. When there was an opportunity to purchase Zach’s podcasting course for just $47, Alundas dove in. He was deeply motivated by the Underdog Empowerment Movement group, especially by Zach himself. Launching The Winner’s Paradigm podcast, Alundas got on Zach’s radar. Zach was impressed by Alundas’ grit and determination, and he knew he was someone he needed on his team. 

 

What You’ll Learn:

  • How Alundas’ childhood shaped him into who he is today.
  • What Alundas hopes to achieve with his podcast.
  • What core values Alundas lives by. 
  • And much more!!

 

Favorite Quote:

“As entrepreneurs, as alphas, we figure out the way to win, and then we dominate.” -Alundas Havens

 

Connect With Alundas:

 

LinkedIn

 

The Winners Paradigm

 

How to Get Involved:

 

Get podcasting help here.

 

For more on how to grow your business, check out this episode. 


If you enjoyed this episode, head over and visit us on Apple Podcasts - leave a review and let us know what you thought! Your feedback keeps us going. Thanks for helping us spread the word!
